title: 473 17 "The Encircling Walls Activated! The Whitebeard Pirates Backed into a Corner!!"Transliteration: "Hōi Sakusen Sadō! Shirohige Kaizoku-dan Zettaizetsumei!!" (Japanese:包囲壁作動! 白ひげ海賊団絶体絶命!!) Hiroaki Miyamoto Hitoshi Tanaka October 31, 2010(2010-10-31)[21]
transformers_text: 473 17 The Encircling Walls Activated The White beard Pirates Backed into a Corner Transliteration H i Sak use n Sad Shiro hig e Kai z oku dan Z etta ize tsu mei Japanese Hiroaki Miyamoto Hitoshi Tanaka October 31 2010 2010 10 31 21 In a desperate attempt to stop White beard from advancing to the execution platform the Marines activate walls to block White beard's path but is stopped by the ice S qu ard realizes his error in White beard's stabbing and bursts into tears but Marco comforts him Meanwhile Luffy and his allies charge to the execution platform and the Marines attack them to no avail White beard confronts John Giant and defeats him with a punch to the chest Luffy uses his arms to reach Ace but the Marines activate the walls and stops Luffy However it could not move Oars Jr 's body Aka in u uses his Meteor Volcano attack to melt the ice in an attempt to prevent White beard's pirates from reaching Ace much to Luffy's horror
